lead_paragraph: BRENNER--David, died peacefully at his home on June 22, 2016, after a courageous battle with cancer at the age of 57. Beloved husband of Alyson. Loving father of Michael and Sarah. Born April 29, 1959 in New York City to Deborah and Erv. Graduated from Ramapo Sr. High School in 1976 and earned a MA from SUNY Albany, and pursued doctoral studies at RPI and Penn State. He married Alyson, his high school sweetheart in 1982. During the course of his career he worked at CSI, NYNEX, and Videobureau. He was a board member at the Dysautonomia Foundation for 10 years, after which he served as Executive Director. His dedication, talents and accomplishments in making life better for those with FD were exceptional. Donations in his memory may be made at www.famdys.org. Service Sunday 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
